comments: She\'s the best! So passionate & knowledgeable! About 3 multiple choice exams. 3 credits of research studies which are cake. Study and ready! Can\'t emphasize that enough! Pop quizzes! Iclicker is used for participation, so be in class. Group discussions/work which is easy. One of my hardest classes, but also the most interesting! Take her, she\'s fun

comments: She offers a lot of extra credit so take advantage of every opportunity, you have to read in order to pass the class, the powerpoints are on moodle, no midterm or final just 3 exams & some pop quizzes here & there. Take advantage of extra credit, I failed all 3 of my exams but the extra credit got me a B+. Good class overall & a very good professor

comments: Dr. Shea is an amazing professor! She\'s so passionate, knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the subject that it makes it easy to pay attention in lecture! Her tests aren\'t too difficult if you do the studying. 3 tests, all multiple choice. Gives pop quizzes & E.C. Strongly strongly recommend and I would definitely take her again.

comments: She\'s an AMAZING TEACHER! love her enthusiasm as she teaches the class, she loves it when students participate, is very good with names. I took her for a 5 wk summer course and it was pretty intense, I learned a lot. She had 2 multiple choice exams, usually they reflected her PowerPoint but a lot of it was terminology from the book, gives extra CR

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Hilarious (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Love her effort, clarity and helpfulness. The topics can be tough if you are not interested and not pay attention. Book is required and materials on power point is important to 2 multiple choice exams. She will explain till you get it if any questions. Attendance is a must. My suggestion? Ask lots of questions and be active in class. She likes it!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Hilarious (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Love love love her class so much.The class was very interesting and also easy. You can pass the it without using the book since 85% of the power point is from the book itself. Testes are pretty straight forward if you study enough. If you have the chance to be in her class taker her! You wont regret it one bit.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Hilarious (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Dr. Shea is amazing. Her power points are the best! So clear and easy to understand, love how she puts them together. She has a good sense of humor. No homework, just 3 exams and 1 two page paper. Exams are straight from the power points. She uses good examples to help understand the topic. I would love to take her again! :)

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (6)  Hilarious (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Shea\'s lectures can get tedious but she tries to crack jokes to make students laugh and tries to make the class fun, Her tests are NOT easy but NOT super complex but reading the book and her power points are essential to passing her class, She\'s really nice and tries to be lenient with grading. Overall she\'s a chill teacher.

comments: Boring lectures but she tries to make them fun, attendance is mandatory bc you\'re graded on surprise group projects.(They\'re easy)Take her class. You will be fine as long as you keep up with the readings and go through the notes in class. 3 exams and 2 papers(easy).
